data.title: ԱՌԱՋՆՈՐԴԱՐԱՆ ԻՐԱՔԻ ՀԱՅՈՑ
data.meta_description: Armenian diocese of iraq-مطرانية الارمن في العراق-առաջնորդարան իրաքի հայոց-ارمن العراق- Iraqi Armenia
data.text:
Armenians of Zakho celebrate the Transfiguration of Jesus Christ

On the 24th of July 2022, the feast of the Transfiguration of the Lord was celebrated at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin in Zakho, by Father Masis Shahinian. Where The Chairman and members of the Administrative Subcommittee of…

priests from Armenia arrive Baghdad

On the 23ed of July 2022, the reverend father Ghevont Sagatilian and Father Atam Movsesian, arrive Baghdad from the Church of the Holy See of Etchmiadzin in Armenia, In order to work at the Armenian Diocese, where the Archimandrite Oshagan…

The 96th anniversary of the Armenian Youth Association’s establishment in Baghdad

On the 22nd of July 2022, the Armenian Youth Association celebrated the 96th anniversary of the association’s founding. The celebration started with a speech by Mr. Garabet Kalustian the association’s president. The celebration was attended by the Archimandrite Oshagan Gulgulian,…

Divine Liturgy at St. Mary the Virgin church in Zakho

On the 11th of July 2022, under the Auspices of His Eminence Archbishop, Dr. Avak Asadourian a Divine Liturgy took place at St. Mary the Virgin church in Zakho which was celebrated by His Grace Archbishop Michael Achabahian, Archbishop of…

Divine Liturgy at St. Nerses Shnorhali Church in Duhok

On the 10th of July 2022, under the Auspices of His Eminence Archbishop, Dr. Avak Asadourian a Divine Liturgy took place at St. Nerses Shnorhali Church in Duhok which was celebrated by His Grace Archbishop Michael Achabahian, Archbishop of Shirak…

The Archbishop of Shirak province visits the Armenian Orthodox Diocese

On the 9th of July 2022, His Eminence Archbishop Dr. Avak Asadourian received at the Armenian Diocese the Archbishop Michael Achabahian, Archbishop of Shirk Province in Armenia. The guest prayed at the Cathedral of St. Gregory the Illuminator, then toured…

opening new hall at Homenetmen

On the 27th of June 2022, the Armenian Sports Club-Homenetmen held the opening ceremony of a new hall called Arshag and Ara Yessaian, with the attendance of the Archimandrite Oshagan Gulgulian, head of the Armenian sect, Mr. Alek Gharibian, the…

Dr. Jawad Al-Baydani visits the Armenian Orthodox Diocese

On the 29th of June 2022, the head of the Armenian sect, Archimandrite Oshagan Gulgulian, received Dr. Jawad Al-Baydani, a writer and supporter of the Armenian cause, Al-Baydani congratulated the archimandrite on his new position.

Mr.Yonadam Kanna visits the Armenian Orthodox diocese

On the 28th of June 2022, the elected Archimandrite Oshagan Gulgulian, received Mr. Yonadam Kanna, General Secretary of the Assyrian Democratic Movement, and his accompanying delegation. During the visit, the guests expressed their congratulations on the elected Archimandrite. The chairman…

The Archimandrite visits the Armenian Embassy in Iraq￼

On the 27th of June 2022, the head of the Armenian sect, Archimandrite Oshagan Gulgulian, accompanied by the Chairman of the Central Administrative Committee, Mr. Melkon Melkonian, visited the Embassy of the Republic of Armenia in Iraq and met with…
